name: Run For It!
description:
You're stuck in a time loop! Repeat the cycle before your opponent to break free.

In Run For It! you race against another player to cross the road. The first one to 10 crossings wins the game.

Use your power to swap places with your opponent when in a pinch or to hinder them.

A green line may appear every time someone completes a crossing, touch it to slow down time and run to victory!

P.S. Beware of the pink car.

Controls

First player:

W - Move up

S - Move down

D - activate teleport

Second player:

Up arrow - Move up

Down arrow  - Move down

Right arrow  - activate teleport

*This game was made with GameMaker Studio 2
